mapper.select: SELECT * FROM worker＿info w where gartenId=#{gartenId} and w.job='老师' and w.isValid=0

SELECT * FROM garten_video v,worker＿info w WHERE w.gartenId=v.gartenId and w.token=#{token} and NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM garten_video ,worker＿info WHERE v.type = 0 AND (v.pointId!=#{classId} or #{classId} is null) )
and type not in ('3')
mapper.update: update worker＿info w set w.token=#{token},tokenTime=now() where phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber} and w.job='老师'
mapper.insert: insert into activity_detail set contentHtml=#{htmlAddress}, timeStart=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{timeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), timeEnd=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{timeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), gartenId=#{gartenId}, img=#{img}, content=#{content}, activityAddress=#{activityAddress}, title=#{title}, joinTime=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{joinTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), htmlImgs=#{imgAddress}
mapper.select: select token from worker＿info w where phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber} and w.job='总管理员' and w.isvalid=0

SELECT * FROM garten_photos gp join parent_info p on gp.job='家长' and gp.id=p.parentId join baby_info b on find_in_set(b.babyId,p.babyId) join worker＿info w on find_in_set(b.classId,w.classId) WHERE w.token=#{token} and gp.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0 and b.isValid=0 and p.isValid=0 group by gp.infoId desc
select * from garten_photos p join worker＿info w on w.gartenId=p.gartenId where p.job in('老师','园长') and w.token=#{token} and p.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0
select * from garten_photos p,worker＿info w where p.id=w.workerId and p.job=w.job and w.token=#{token} and p.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0 order by p.infoId desc limit 1
SELECT * FROM daijie_info d, baby_info b WHERE b.classId=#{classId} AND d.babyId = b.babyId AND d.isValid = 0 AND b.isValid = 0 GROUP BY d.daijieId

SELECT d.activityId, d.contentHtml, d.timeStart, d.timeEnd, d.gartenId, d.img,d.content,d.activityAddress,d.title,d.joinTime, count(l.activityId) count FROM activity_detail d LEFT JOIN activity_log l ON d.activityId = l.activityId WHERE d.gartenId = #{gartenId} AND d.isValid = 0 GROUP BY d.activityId
select count(1) from activity_log l where l.babyId=#{babyId} and l.activityId=#{activityId}
select gartenName,workerName,flowers,headImg,classId from `worker＿info` w join garten_info g ON w.gartenId = g.gartenId where w.token=#{token} and g.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0
select * from version v where type=0 and v.isValid=0 order by v.time desc limit 1
select * from garten_photos p where infoId=#{infoId}

select * from garten_info g
where gartenId=#{gartenId} and g.isValid=0

SELECT d.activityId activityId, d.img img, d.content content, d.timeStart timeStart, d.timeEnd timeEnd, d.isValid isValid ,d.htmlImgs htmlImgs,d.contentHtml contentHtml,count(1) count FROM activity_detail d left join activity_log a on d.activityId=a.activityId WHERE d.activityId =#{activityId} and a.isValid=0 and d.isValid=0
select count(1) count from `worker＿info` w LEFT JOIN info_log i on i.id=w.workerId where w.token=#{token} and w.job=i.job and i.state=0 and w.isValid=0 and i.isValid=0
select count(1) count from `worker＿info` w LEFT JOIN info_log i on i.id=w.workerId where w.token=#{token} and w.job=i.job and i.type=2 and i.state=0 and w.isValid=0 and i.isValid=0
SELECT unix_timestamp(u.time) FROM baby_info b JOIN unusual u ON b.babyId=u.jobId and u.job='宝宝' WHERE b.classId = #{classId} AND b.isValid = 0 AND u.isValid = 0 GROUP BY u.time
SELECT * FROM baby_info b LEFT JOIN baby_leave_log c on b.babyId=c.babyId WHERE b.classId = #{classId} and c.time and b.isValid=0 and c.isValid=0
SELECT * FROM worker_leave_log l JOIN worker＿info w on w.workerId=l.workerId WHERE w.token = #{token} and w.isValid=0 and l.isValid=0
SELECT * FROM baby_info b join garten_class c on c.classId=b.classId WHERE b.classId = #{classId} and b.isValid=0
SELECT * FROM baby_info b join garten_class c on c.classId=b.classId WHERE b.babyId=#{babyId} and b.isValid=0 group by b.babyId

select u.unusualTime,u.unusualType, u.unusualImg,u.jobId, u.gartenId,u.state, u.fileId, u.cardNo,u.unusualId,u.time,u.job, b.babyName jobName,b.babyHead jobHead FROM unusual u join baby_info b on u.jobId=b.babyId and u.job='宝宝' where b.classId=#{classId} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(u.time)=#{time} and u.isValid=0 and b.isValid=0

select u.unusualTime,u.unusualType, u.unusualImg,u.jobId, u.gartenId,u.state, u.fileId, u.cardNo,u.unusualId,u.time,u.job, b.babyName jobName,b.babyHead jobHead FROM unusual u, baby_info b where u.jobId=b.babyId and u.job='宝宝' and b.gartenId=#{gartenId} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(u.time)=#{time} and u.isValid=0 and b.isValid=0
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time) FROM garten_lesson WHERE classId=#{classId} and isValid =0
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.time) FROM garten_recipe r LEFT JOIN worker＿info w ON r.gartenId = w.gartenId WHERE w.token = #{token} AND r.isValid = 0 AND w.isValid = 0

SELECT DISTINCT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.time) FROM daijie_info r , parent_info p , baby_info b WHERE r.babyId=b.babyId and r.parentId = p.parentId and b.classId=#{classId} AND r.isValid = 0 AND p.isValid = 0 AND b.isValid = 0 AND r.daijieState = 1
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.time) FROM ignore_time r join worker＿info w on r.gartenId=w.gartenId WHERE w.token = #{token} and r.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0 order by UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.time)
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.time) FROM ignore_time r join worker＿info w on r.gartenId=w.gartenId WHERE w.token = #{token} and r.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0 order by UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.time) desc
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(wc.time) FROM worker_check_log wc join worker＿info w on wc.workerId=w.workerId WHERE w.token = #{token} and wc.arriveTime is not null and wc.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0
mapper.update: UPDATE unusual u set state=#{state} where unusualId=#{unusualId}
mapper.select:
SELECT p.gartenId gartenId,p.babyId babyId,p.time time,p.learn learn,p.play play,p.eat eat,p.sleep sleep,p.remark remark,p.performanceId performanceId ,b.babyName babyName,b.babyHead babyHead FROM baby_info b LEFT JOIN baby_performance_log p ON b.babyId=p.babyId
WHERE b.classId = #{classId} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now())-86400 < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(p.time) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(p.time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) and b.isValid=0 and p.isValid=0

SELECT * FROM worker_check_log wc LEFT JOIN worker＿info w on wc.workerId=w.workerId WHERE w.token = #{token} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now())-86400 < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(wc.time) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(wc.time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) and wc.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0

SELECT * FROM garten_info i JOIN worker＿info w on w.gartenId=i.gartenId join garten_recipe r on r.gartenId=w.gartenId WHERE w.token = #{token} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.time)=#{time} and i.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0 and r.isValid=0

SELECT r.babyId,r.leaveTime,r.time,r.reason,r.leaveState,r.isValid,r.leaveId,r.endTime,bi.babyHead,bi.babyName FROM baby_info bi JOIN baby_leave_log r ON r.babyId = bi.babyId WHERE bi.classId=#{classId} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.leaveTime)-86400 < #{time} and #{time} < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.endTime) AND r.isValid = 0 AND bi.isValid = 0

SELECT r.babyId,r.leaveTime,r.time,r.reason,r.leaveState,r.isValid,r.leaveId,r.endTime,b.babyHead,b.babyName FROM baby_info b JOIN baby_leave_log r ON r.babyId = b.babyId WHERE b.gartenId = #{gartenId} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.leaveTime)-86400 < #{time} and #{time} < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.endTime) AND b.isValid = 0 AND r.isValid = 0

SELECT * FROM worker＿info w JOIN worker_leave_log r ON r.workerId = w.workerId WHERE w.token = #{token} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.leaveTime)-86400 < #{time} and #{time} < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.endTime) AND w.isValid = 0 AND r.isValid = 0
SELECT * FROM worker＿info w WHERE w.token = #{token} and w.job='老师' and w.isValid=0
SELECT * FROM worker＿info w WHERE w.token = #{token} and w.isValid=0

SELECT * FROM worker＿info wi WHERE wi.gartenId = ( SELECT gartenId FROM worker＿info WHERE token = #{token} and isValid=0 ) and wi.workerId not in ( SELECT workerId FROM worker＿info WHERE token = #{token} and isValid=0 ) AND wi.isValid = 0
select * from parent_info p , baby_info b where b.classId=#{classId} and FIND_IN_SET(b.babyId,p.babyId) and p.isValid=0 and b.isValid=0 group by p.parentId

SELECT concat(b.babyName,b.parentRelation) name,b.babyHead headimg,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(f.time ) time,f.flowerId flowerId FROM worker_flower f, baby_info b, worker＿info w WHERE w.token=#{token} and w.workerId=f.workerId and f.parentId=b.parentId and f.isValid=0 and b.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0
SELECT count(1) FROM worker_flower f, worker＿info w WHERE w.token = #{token} AND w.workerId = f.workerId AND f.isValid = 0 AND w.isValid = 0
select * from garten_class where find_in_set(classId,#{classId})
select * from worker＿info w where phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber} and job='老师' and w.isValid=0
mapper.insert:
insert into duanxin
phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, type=#{type}, number=#{number}, time=now()
mapper.delete: delete from photo_dianzan where job=#{job} and jobId=#{jobId} and infoId=#{infoId}
